•         There are 10 questions in this test.   You must complete the test with a score of 100% to pass.

•         Immediate feedback is provided on each of your responses.

•         You are provided an unlimited number of attempts to achieve the passing score.

•         Once you answer all questions, you are prompted with a "Blue Checkbox" to submit your answers for grading

•         You cannot exit and re-enter this test, and the test only submits (saves) the answers at the end.

Carrier of Ammunition Course Test

Please enter info in the following fields.

Service Number

e.g. T12 551 190

Rank, Initial, Lastname

e.g. Lt(N) A.R. Smythe
